io.neba.api.annotations

Annotation Type Children


  • @Documented
@Target(value={FIELD,ANNOTATION_TYPE})
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface Children

    Provides a Collection, List or Set of children of the resource. The resource might be the current resource itself, a resource designated by a Path annotation or a referenced resource.

    Examples

    Children of the current resource 
     @Children
 private List<Resource> children;
    Children of the current resource as Pages 
     @Children
 private List<Page> pages;
    Children of the resource at the path "/path/to/resource" 
     @Path("/path/to/resource")
 @Children
 private List<Page> pages;
    Children of the resource referenced in the property named "pages" 
     @Reference
 @Children
 private List<Page> pages;
    Children of the resource referenced in the property named "propContainingReference" 
     @Path("propContainingReference")
 @Reference
 @Children
 private List<Page> pages;
    The "jcr:content" node of Children of the current resource, adapted to "PageContent". 
     @Children(resolveBelowEveryChild = "/jcr:content")
 private List<PageContent> pageContents;
    Author:
    Olaf Otto, Daniel Rey

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      String resolveBelowEveryChild 

    • Element Detail

      • resolveBelowEveryChild

        public abstract String resolveBelowEveryChild
        Returns:
        the relative path to use to resolve a resource below each child instead of using the child directly.
        Default:
        ""
